message: Given the potential loss of value in future rounds, I propose a division of 75$ for you and 25$ for me. Accept this offer to secure your share.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I can do better. This offer gives me a smaller share, but it's still a good starting point. Let's see if you can do better.

Considering the decreasing value of money due to inflation, I propose a division of 65$ for you and 35$ for me. This maintains a fair balance while accounting for the diminishing worth of our currency.
I'm willing to compromise again, but I think I can get a better deal. This offer gives me a smaller share, but it's still a good compromise. I'm hoping you'll see the value in meeting me halfway.
